alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:14AM CST until December 24 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations from a light glaze to a few hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
